cause.description:
Don’t Go Unheard is still a slowly developing cause. Our goal is to prove that there is hope through the toughest of times. Suicide is a small word with a huge meaning, its something that should be taken more seriously. This is a great attempt at overcoming a challenge so large, a challenge which is right in front of us, we are here to listen. The solution is love.
1. The realization that someone is there to listen and to aid could be the turnaround of a lifetime
cause.mission: prove that there is hope through the toughest times in life.
cause.name: Don't Go Unheard
